sentences.en: Do not hallo, till you are out of the wood.
Hallo , Susi , actually, we have already meet.
sentences.cn: 你好,苏西, 实际上我们已经见过面了.
哎, 你听得见我说的话 吗 ?

sentences.en: Hallo, Denise. Pleased to meet you. Will not you come in?
sentences.cn: 好啊, 丹尼斯. 见到你很高兴, 请进来好 吗 ?
喂, 是牛津区56767 吗 ?
你好, 约翰, 快请进.

sentences.en: Hallo, may I speak to Frank, please.
Hallo, Mutter ! Wir haben jetzt geniesst gehen. Danke scho n. Und Sie?
sentences.cn: 嗨! 妈!我们刚刚吃完晚饭. 谢谢, 那您 呢 ?

sentences.en: Hallo, Thomas und Anna, was macht ihr hier? Ist der Platz frei?
sentences.cn: 嗨, 托马斯、安娜, 你们在这儿干什么? 这个位子空 吗 ?
喂! 你今天好 吗 ?

sentences.en: Hallo! Tom, what are you doing?
sentences.cn: 嘿! 汤姆, 你在干什么 呢 ?

sentences.en: The horse stop instantly at the hallo of its master.
sentences.cn: 主人嗨了一声,马就立刻停下来了.

sentences.en: Very softly, she called out: "Hallo? Who's there?"
sentences.cn: 她轻声细气喊道：“喂？有人吗？”

sentences.en: Well! And hallo you!'said Jerry, more hoarsely than before.
sentences.cn: “嗯, 哈罗! ” 杰瑞说, 嗓子比刚才更沙哑.
